attributes.action: MPs to justify invoking Article 50 in the light of poor economic predictions.
attributes.background: A majority decision to leave the EU has been obtained in the referendum on June 23 yet all predictions are that the country will face recession and economic hardship as a direct result. A responsible UK government therefore has no mandate to wreak economic havoc on the UK and its citizens.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
